scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = 'public/assets'; const dst = 'dist/assets'; if(!fs.existsSync(dst)) fs.mkdirSync(dst, {recursive:true}); fs.cpSync(src, dst, {recursive:true, force:true}); console.log('âœ“ Assets copied to dist');"
